summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Sections 24.08.130, 24.62.080, 24.62.100 and 24.62.150 of the Seattle Municipal Code (Zoning Ordinance 86300) Sections 3.13, 22.41, 22.43 and 22.48) to clarify the definition of "through lots" and to modify certain special requirements and exceptions to bulk regulations pertaining to through lots.
